title: Cultural Clash Planner
description: Plans the friction points between two cultures, identifying key differences, potential misunderstandings, and how they can be used in stories. Cultural clashes between characters from different cultures are a primary storytelling tool.

area.description: Area of difference (greetings, dining, body language, values, etc.)

severity.description: How severe the consequences of misunderstanding can be

story_use.description: How to use this clash in a story (comedy of manners, diplomatic incident, plot driver, character growth)

historical_clashes.description: Past incidents where these cultures clashed

x-cross-references.culture-profile: Both cultures are defined in Culture Profiles
x-cross-references.cultural-manifestations: Specific manifestations that clash are detailed in Cultural Manifestations Sheets
x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: Clashes may occur between sovereign powers
